SEARCH
Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint

Class SelectModeStrategy

java.lang.Object
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.SelectModeStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModeStrategy
public class SelectModeStrategy extends Object implements ModeStrategy
The SelectModeStrategy class implements the ModeStrategy interface and handles the behavior of selecting and moving shapes in the paint application. It responds to mouse events for selecting a shape, dragging it, and finalizing the shape.

This strategy is used when the user is in select mode, which allows them to select an existing shape from the canvas and move it around. It also updates the properties panel to display the properties of the currently selected shape.

  • Constructor Details

    • SelectModeStrategy

      public SelectModeStrategy(PaintModel model, PropertiesPanel properties)
      Constructs a SelectModeStrategy instance.
      Parameters:
      model - The PaintModel instance that manages the shapes.
      properties - The PropertiesPanel instance for loading and displaying shape properties.

  • Method Details

    • onMouseMoved

      public void onMouseMoved(Point point)
      This method is called when the mouse is moved. It doesn't perform any action in select mode.
      Specified by:
      onMouseMoved in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The current mouse position.

    • onMousePressed

      public void onMousePressed(Point point, boolean isPrimaryButton, boolean isSecondaryButton)
      This method is called when the mouse is pressed. It selects a shape if the primary mouse button is pressed. It finalizes the current temporary shape if needed and updates the properties panel to reflect the properties of the selected shape.
      Specified by:
      onMousePressed in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse was pressed.
      isPrimaryButton - Whether the primary mouse button (left-click) was pressed.
      isSecondaryButton - Whether the secondary mouse button (right-click) was pressed.

    • onMouseDragged

      public void onMouseDragged(Point point)
      This method is called when the mouse is dragged. It moves the currently selected shape based on the movement of the mouse and updates the model.
      Specified by:
      onMouseDragged in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The current mouse position.

    • onMouseReleased

      public void onMouseReleased(Point point)
      This method is called when the mouse is released. It doesn't perform any action in select mode.
      Specified by:
      onMouseReleased in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse was released.

    • finalizeShape

      public void finalizeShape()
      Finalizes the current drawing process by adding the shape to the model and clearing the selected shape. This is typically invoked when the user finishes selecting a shape to be moved.
